ygData.subject: zimel's blades
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail, I am a level 4 human paladin based in Freeport.  I have been working on a quest and need some help.  I ll list what I know below my questions (below a
ygData.messageBody:
Hail,

I am a level 4 human paladin based in Freeport. I have been working on
a quest and need some help. I'll list what I know below my questions
(below a spoiler warning):

I need to know when Grolaf Steadirt leaves his shop and heads to the inn
for a drink so that I can talk to him. The time of day and which inn
would be very helpful.

Now for what I know: (might be considered a spoiler though not complete)
x
x
x
x
x
x
x
x
x
x
x
I received the quest from the female paladin on the upstairs balcony of
the freeport paladin's guild.

She asked me to take a note to an informant they have in the Freeport
militia. I should say "Truth is Good" to the guards and the correct one
would respond to me.

I found him in west freeport behind the milita house. sorry, don't have
my notes here so can't remember his name. He asks for a note you were
given, you give it to him, and after he gives you something to take
back. A note with coded info and a title at the top Zimel's Blades

after reporting back you are sent to the hall of records to talk to
Rashinda. She was a total pain in the butt to get her to respond to my
question. Again, I don't have my notes but it was something like "can
you tell me if zimel's blades existed". Once she responds a strange
thing happens. A male NPC enters the room and says "excuse me, wrong
room" so he is triggered by talking to Rashinda. Not sure what he means

After you get her to respond you ask "Who is Ariska Zimel ?" I think I
spelled his name right... She will tell you about him and mention
Groflah Steadirt (in Groflah's Armor place). It is up to you to make
the associated to talk to Groflah.

When you find him (upstairs) and ask him about Zimel he responds that he
doesn't know any Zimel and that he can't talk there. It is here that
I'm stuck. I've heard he leaves and goes to get a drink but I don't
know when or where.

Thanks for any help
Shawn
Flarfianb, level 4 paladin
